snippet: Los Angeles extended the N.B.A.’s longest current victory streak as Chris Paul scored 25 points and the Clippers subdued New Orleans in overtime.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Los Angeles Clippers defeat New Orleans Pelicans, 114-111; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles extended the N.B.A.’s longest current victory streak as Chris Paul scored 25 points and the Clippers subdued New Orleans in overtime.

headline.print_headline: Clippers’ Streak Reaches Nine With Overtime Win
headline.main: Clippers’ Streak Reaches Nine With Overtime Win
